<S%H310>Behind<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> also and the <S%H4201>posts<s%> hast thou set <S%H7760>up<s%> thy <S%H2146>remembrance<s%>: for thou hast <S%H1540>discovered<s%> thyself to another than me, and art gone <S%H5927>up<s%>; thou hast <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> thy <S%H4904>bed<s%>, and <S%H3772>made<s%> thee a covenant with them; thou <S%H157>lovedst<s%> their <S%H4904>bed<s%> <S%H3027>where<s%> thou <S%H2372>sawest<s%> it. made: or, hewed it for thyself larger than theirs where: or, thou providedst room
